item.content:encoded:
Moon Rock Café is a fast-paced Overcooked inspired game where the player has to manage a lot of responsibilities in a space-restaurant. Your main goal is to juggle a lot of different tasks such as seating customers, taking their order & making sure they don’t order something they’re allergic to, getting the orders to the kitchen and finally, when the food is ready, delivering that meal to the correct alien!

My responsibilities in the project

I wrote the code for the core game play loop in this game, another programmer was responsible for the audio manager and one programmer did the Upgrade system.

My contributions:

  • Player & camera movement.
  • Customer spawning, seating, order handling, kitchen logic, and food handling.
  • Customer AI.
  • Modular customer system that let us easily create different customer types in the editor using ScriptableObjects as building pieces.
  • Tutorial system with scrolling tutorial text that respects line-breaks.
  • ScriptableObject event system that can send events with generic data type(s).

Link to github repo: https://github.com/alvolex/GP2Team10
